TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFileChangeNotificationSystem

summary.span: 定義將自訂 物件公開給快取實作的方式。

span.span: Defines a way to expose a custom object to a cache implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 ASP.NET 中，介面會提供內部的檔案變更通知管理存取權。In ASP.NET, the interface provides access to internal file-change notification management. 介面在內部使用類別。The interface is used internally by the class. 當 ASP.NET 應用程式定義域中執行時的快取實作時，會實作 ASP.NET介面透過屬性。When a cache implementation runs in an ASP.NET application domain, ASP.NET implements an interface through the property. 類別偵測到此屬性，並使用 ASP.NET 的檔案變更通知系統收回根據檔案變更通知的快取項目。The class detects this property and uses the ASP.NET file-change notification system to evict cache entries based on file-change notification. 在非 ASP.NET 應用程式中，沒有任何實作自訂的主機環境介面。In non-ASP.NET applications, there is no host environment that implements a custom interface. 如此一來，類別會使用的 CLR 類別。As a result, the class uses the class of the CLR.

MemberSignature.Value: public void StartMonitoring (string filePath, System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback onChangedCallback, out object state, out DateTimeOffset lastWriteTime, out long fileSize);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StartMonitoring(string filePath, class System.Runtime.Caching.OnChangedCallback onChangedCallback, [out] object& state, [out] valuetype System.DateTimeOffset& lastWriteTime, [out] int64& fileSize) cil managed

public: void StartMonitoring(System::String ^ filePath, System::Runtime::Caching::OnChangedCallback ^ onChangedCallback, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Object ^ % state, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] DateTimeOffset % lastWriteTime, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] long % fileSize);

param.name: filePath
param.span: 要監控變更之目錄或檔案的完整實體路徑。

span.span: The fully qualified physical path of a directory or file to monitor for changes.

param.name: onChangedCallback
param.span: 一個實作 委派之方法的參考。

span.span: A reference to a method that implements the delegate.

param.span: 當監控的檔案或目錄變更時，主機環境的 介面實作會呼叫 類別來引發事件。

span.span: When the monitored file or directory changes, the host environment's implementation of the interface raises an event by calling the class.

param.name: state
param.span: 由主機環境提供的狀態。

span.span: The state that is supplied by the host environment.

param.span: 快取實作和自訂變更監視器應該將狀態值視為不透明。

span.span: Cache implementations and custom change monitors should treat the state value as opaque.

param.span: 但是必須儲存狀態，以便在快取實作呼叫 方法時，能夠將狀態傳送至主機環境。

span.span: However, the state must be stored so that it can be sent to the host environment when the cache implementation calls the method.

param.name: lastWriteTime
param.span: 當此方法傳回時，會包含 filePath 位置上一次發生寫入作業的日期和時間。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the last date and time that a write operation occurred on filePath.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。
主機環境會傳回此參數。

span.span: This parameter is returned from the host environment.

param.name: fileSize
param.span: 當此方法傳回時，會包含所監控之 filePath 的大小總數。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the total size of the monitored filePath.

param.span: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。
主機環境會傳回此參數。

span.span: This parameter is returned from the host environment.

summary.span: 向主機環境註冊要監控的檔案路徑。

span.span: Registers a file path to monitor with the host environment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法由自訂快取物件和自訂變更實作主機環境的監視介面，以便註冊用於監視與主機環境的檔案路徑。This method is used by custom cache objects and custom change monitors that implement the host environment's interface in order to register file paths for monitoring with the host environment. 會呼叫方法的實作器以便登錄的檔案或目錄變更監視的介面。The method is called by implementers of the interface in order to register a file or directory for change monitoring.

MemberSignature.Value: public void StopMonitoring (string filePath, object state);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopMonitoring(string filePath, object state) cil managed
Public Sub StopMonitoring (filePath As String, state As Object)
public: void StopMonitoring(System::String ^ filePath, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: filePath
param.span: 要停止監控之檔案或資料夾的路徑。

span.span: The path of the file or folder to stop monitoring.

param.span: 這應該符合先前呼叫 方法時傳遞的檔案路徑值。

span.span: This should match a file path value that was passed in an earlier call to the method.

param.name: state
param.span: 在先前呼叫 方法期間，原本由主機環境提供的狀態資訊。

span.span: The state information that was originally supplied by the host environment during an earlier call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必須自訂快取所呼叫的方法，且自訂變更會在主機環境處置若要停止監視檔案路徑和目錄的監視。The method must be called by custom caches and custom change monitors that are being disposed by the host environment in order to stop monitoring file paths and directories.
